author: Staff Reporter
text:
Communist Party of India (Marxist) staged demonstration in front of Arunachaleswarar Temple demanding action against officials whose lethargy had caused the death of four devotees in the stampede at Tiruvannamalai .

Rs. 5 lakh solatium demanded

M. Veerabadran, State committee member of the party said the government should grant Rs. 5 lakh as solatium to each victim’s family. He said the government should take enough precautions during festivals of this magnitude.
title: Stampede deaths: CPI(M) demands action against officials
